description:
A wet chain lube designed for those who aren't afraid of a little bit of rain, and those who go on long, long rides. It resists rain and puddles, but when your chain needs some cleaning, all you need to do is spray it with a hose to clean it off – thanks to WPL's Emulsifite technology, the high-pressure water dissolves the lube.

  • Premium bio-based formula made with natural ingredients
  • EmulsifiteTM technology provides dynamic cleaning abilities and prevents black goop buildup
  • Long-lasting formula improves pedalling efficiency by reducing chain wear and friction
  • For use on bicycle chains, shifters, derailleurs and cables
  • Biodegradable, PTFE-free formula is kind to the environment
name: WPL Wet Chain Lube 120ml
